title: GIVE THANKS GIVEAWAY
desc: 1)   - The day of we will need as many helpful hands as possible to pass out turkeys! 2)   - Along with each turkey comes a fully stocked care package of sides. If you make a care package, a BAAYP rep in your area will pick it up from you!? 3)  about this event,   through social media!?? ------------ A non-profit that provides highly effective life skills, job training and educational programs to youth in Southern California. A FREE academy for 17-25 year old students who are seeking a high school diploma.? The curriculum includes classes needed to earn a California high school diploma as well as Shelter 37's Aspiring Leaders life skills class. College guidance, tutoring, job training, mental health support, and financial literacy are integral parts of our program!
